name: Cueva de la Finca Siguanha
description:
Introduction

The cave is located on private property near Cobán. You must ask permission to enter the property and the cave. There is a vertical entrance into horizontal stream passage. The passage alternates in size between easily walkable to low crawling. There is a small digging lead at end with some air.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
